entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HTML comment completion broken #35536
    area-razor.tooling
  • HTTP/3 end-to-end signoff for .NET 6 #35531
    area-runtime, HTTP3, 6.0-rc2
  • Pass model to Server with NavigationManager #35530
  • Analyzers for Minimal APIs #35528
    feature-minimal-actions
  • Support DateOnly and TimeOnly as parsing options for [SupplyParameterFromQuery] #35525
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-builtin-components
  • Blazor WebAssembly: Hot reload does not do any UI changes on macOS 11.7 (Apple M1) - .NET 6.0 Preview 7 #35524
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-hot-reload
  • Razor not applying classifications to some C# concepts #35521
    area-razor.tooling, Razor.Tooling
  • Snippets missing tooltips #35520
    enhancement, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, Razor.Tooling
  • http_client's cancellation callback fires when there are no ongoing requests #35517
    area-signalr, signalr-client-c++
  • Unhandled exception in c++ client's hub_connection::stop() method due to cancellation logic #35515
    area-signalr, signalr-client-c++
  • Multi-level inheritance with code-behind #35509
    area-blazor
  • Allow external libraries to extend Results #35508
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Unannotated parameters in disabled nullability context should be treated as optional #35507
    bug, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • Write doc describing what to do when updating Major version/TFM #35506
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Unable to provide a global custom ErrorBoundary by subclassing the existing `ErrorBoundary` class #35504
    investigate, area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Subclassing Startup from StartupBase throws NotSupportedException #35502
    Docs, area-runtime, feature-hosting
  • Support custom error messages for optionality via nullability feature #35501
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • How to access the component instance in the Blazor Xunit test case? #35500
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • Keyboard input doesn't work for InputDateType.DateTimeLocal #35498
    investigate, area-blazor, feature-accessibility, 6.0-rc2
  • SignalR client NPM package corrupt #35494
    area-signalr
  • VSCode: CodeLens references numbers cannot be loaded if re-open the project #35493
    area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs
  • ODE (Safe handle has been closed) after IApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStopping callback is called on HttpSysServer #35491
    area-runtime, servers-httpsys
  • IOExceptions caused by client disconnects are noisy on HttpSysServer #35490
    area-runtime, servers-httpsys
  • Extend the ability to customize parameter binding for Minimal APIs #35489
    api-suggestion, feature-minimal-actions, .NET 7-Candidate
  • NET 6 RC1 Ask Mode - All PRs #35488
    6.0-rc1
  • Need help with my account #35487
    Needs: Author Feedback
  • Let AddSpaStaticFiles be configured with multiple localized spa apps. #35485
    question, area-mvc, feature-spa, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • Unskip consistently failing `Components.E2ETests.ServerTransportsTest`s #35481
    test-failure, area-blazor, blazor-server, 6.0-rc2
  • Minimal APIs naming cleanup #35478
    area-runtime, api-suggestion, feature-minimal-actions, 6.0-rc1

Closed

  • Dotnet watch run cause my Mac to restart #33824
    investigate, Needs: Author Feedback, area-commandlinetools, Status: No Recent Activity, Next sprint planning
  • Open Views/Shared/_Layout.cshtml ,type " <input asp-test="" " in the <body> tag and delete a double quote, the format is incorrect. #35495
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: By Design, Status: Resolved, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs
  • Grpc Service Not Working In Visual Studio 2022 #35466
    area-grpc, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • [Templates] Readme file included when no auth is used #35462
    area-identity, feature-templates, 6.0-rc2
  • Improve reporting for duplicate route names in minimal APIs #35435
    bug, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • Endpoint name metadata should be set automatically to the method name when `Map` overload is called passing a `MethodGroup` #34540
    Priority:1, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Publish from VS 4 Mac produces the wrong service-worker-assets.js manifest #33608
    bug, Done, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Fixed, feature-pwa, 6.0-rc1
  • C++ client needs to support pings #35516
  • Cannot cast string to Boolean #34816
    bug, Done, area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Is Blazor Server an Option in MAUI Project ? #35440
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-desktop, Discussions
  • Weatherforecast runs into unhandeled error with new VS2022 Update #35477
    investigate, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, Needs: Attention :wave:
  • Minimal APIs ModelBinderProvider #33955
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-actions, Backlog
  • RazorComponentElement and RazorComponentAttribute classifications unused #35424
    area-razor.tooling, 17.0-Preview4
  • Form submit action not redirected to default route POST action after upgrade to .NET 6 preview 7 #35384
    area-mvc, feature-routing, Needs: Attention :wave:
  • [Help] How to disable Hot Reload for ASP.NET Core projects. #35387
    area-mvc, feature-hot-reload
  • Feature request: Expose IsActive on NavLink. #35456
    area-blazor, api-suggestion
  • [Blazor] Cannot create Nuget package if files exist inside wwwroot #27740
    bug, area-blazor, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Fixed, feature-static-web-assets, severity-minor, affected-medium, feature-razor-sdk, 6.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Discuss alternatives to change detection #35447
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • Localization API improvements #35497
    api-suggestion
  • 'DisableScopedCssBundling' causes issues when in multiple projects #34586
    bug, area-blazor, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Fixed, feature-static-web-assets, 6.0-rc1
  • blazorserver.styles.css sometimes will 404 #34967
    bug, Needs: Author Feedback, area-blazor, 6.0-rc1
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http:2.2.0 Unable to resolve CVE-2020-1045 Vulnerability #35448
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • Using Filters in SignalR to validate resources #35420
    area-signalr, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • Do not reload the same data .razor #35445
    question, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • Bullscaeeput #35486
  • Kestrel Support for Kerberos #35415
    area-security, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, Discussions
  • Add support for custom model binders in minimal APIs #35472
    area-web-frameworks
  • Blazor JS Interop issues with Browser's langue settings #30348
    investigate, Needs: Author Feedback, area-blazor, Status: No Recent Activity, feature-blazor-jsinterop, Next sprint planning
  • [Blazor] .NET6 Preview 5 - Blazor Server App Published to Azure Web App fails #33863
    investigate, Needs: Author Feedback, area-blazor, Status: No Recent Activity, feature-blazor-deployment, blazor-server, 6.0-rc2
  • Blazor Wasm Hosted Default Authentication not working in razor page #34080
    investigate, Needs: Author Feedback, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, Status: No Recent Activity, feature-blazor-wasm-auth, 6.0.0
  • Create an Analyzer to help users understand acceptable attributes for Minimal APIs #35088
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2

Updated

  • Host grpc service in iis or as an app service? #9020
    area-grpc, Discussions
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2021-34532 | ASP.NET Core Information Disclosure Vulnerability #35246
    area-security, Discussions
  • Make Razor and Roslyn LSP semantic ordering consistent #35398
    External, blocked, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, razor.tooling-fundamentals, Razor.Tooling
  • [HTTP/3] Kestrel closes connection too soon #35470
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, HTTP3
  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.DefaultProjectSnapshot` Retained in Memory after Closing Solution and ForceGC #35450
    bug, Perf, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, 17.0-Preview4
  • Exceptions when serializing log events events in the background #35443
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: By Design, Status: Resolved
  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.DefaultProjectSnapshotManager` Causing Large Amount of `System.Reactive` Components in Memory #35451
    Perf, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, 17.0-Preview4
  • Epic: Minimal API - OpenAPI features #34514
    area-runtime, Epic, feature-minimal-actions, 6.0.0
  • New Service Fabric ASP.NET Core React application does not run #35458
    area-mvc, feature-spa
  • NullReferenceException thrown when making a call to secured API while not authenticated in Blazor WASM app with MSAL auth #30538
    bug, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-blazor-wasm-auth, 6.0-rc2
  • Razor Comment Colorization doesn't colorize all lines #27447
    bug, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vscode, 17.0-Preview4
  • How to stop propagation of HTML DOM event without breaking nested components? #35455
    enhancement, area-blazor, design-proposal, .NET 7-Candidate
  • Blazor wasm: Uncaught (in promise) Error: System.InvalidOperationException: There was an error parsing the event arguments. EventId: '13'. #35348
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, Needs: Attention :wave:, Author: Migration Bot :robot:
  • High CPU usage in RoslynCodeAnalysisService while idle #35266
    Author: Migration Bot :robot:, area-razor.compiler, Backlog
  • Add version to css of nuget package when load page #35333
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, area-razor.compiler
  • Feature request: Commenting out parameters in Razor #35383
    enhancement, feature-razor.language, area-razor.compiler, Backlog
  • [Big Rock] Razor compiler should generate runtime code that is usable at design time #35395
    enhancement, area-razor.compiler, .NET 7-Candidate
  • Allow aspnet-browser-refresh.js to be inserted multiple times #35334
    enhancement, area-commandlinetools, 6.0.0
  • Strange dotnet watch output when editing files from VS2022 #35340
    enhancement, area-commandlinetools, 6.0.0
  • Clean up dotnet watch output on rude edit #35341
    enhancement, area-commandlinetools, 6.0.0
  • dotnet-watch: Blazor Hosted project specifying Server path via --project does not work #35393
    bug, area-commandlinetools, 6.0-rc2
  • AspNetCore Mvc Controller keeps serializing IAsyncEnumerable after connection is closed #35330
    bug, area-web-frameworks
  • View not found running on .Net6 rc1 #35452
    investigate, area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • Blazor WebAssembly App does not build when referencing .NET Standard 2.0 assembly. #35349
    bug, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, Author: Migration Bot :robot:, 6.0-rc1
  • Windows test job failure due to BasicTestApp publish/trimming #35429
    bug, area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • NoHotReloadListenersAreOrdinarilyRegistered fails about 50% of the time locally #35449
    test-failure, area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • Blazor WASM: Upgrading to .NET 6 preview 7 breaks localization #35459
    investigate, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-localization, 6.0-rc2
  • Blazor WebAssembly prerendered root component types may get trimmed away in the client build #35461
    bug, Docs, area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • CSP for Blazor #34428
    enhancement, area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Throw informative exception when Input Controls are not surrounded by EditForm #27804
    bug, area-blazor, component ecosystem, severity-minor, affected-medium, reevaluate, feature-blazor-builtin-components, 6.0-rc2
  • InvokeVoidAsync shouldn't serialize return value to .NET #16632
    bug, area-blazor, affected-few, severity-minor, feature-blazor-jsinterop, 6.0-rc2
  • Calling InvokeAsync(StateHasChanged) causes page to fallback to default culture #28521
    bug, area-blazor, severity-major, affected-medium, 6.0-rc2
  • Adding a format to input=time causes issues #13322
    enhancement, area-blazor, affected-few, severity-major, feature-blazor-component-model, Backlog
  • Accessing Local Storage inside `DelegatingHandler` in Blazor Server and .NET MAUI Blazor #34421
    investigate, enhancement, area-blazor, feature-blazor-desktop, Backlog
  • UseSpa can't serve anonymous requests if there's a fallback policy in place #18787
    bug, investigate, area-mvc, feature-spa, affected-few, severity-minor, Backlog
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor GeneratePackageOnBuild creating folders for random static web assets #29561
    bug, investigate, area-blazor, feature-static-web-assets, affected-few, severity-major, 6.0-rc2
  • Integration test with nUnit seems to fail after .net core has been upgraded from 3.1 to 5 #30024
    investigate, area-mvc, feature-mvc-testing, Next sprint planning
  • Auto refresh dotnet watch for ASP.NET Core 5 not working when razor compilation is enabled #27707
    enhancement, area-commandlinetools, feature-dotnetwatch, affected-few, severity-blocking, Next sprint planning
  • VS Code : There is no explanation for the method in intellisense Completion list #29675
    bug, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vscode, Razor.Tooling
  • Allow @page directive in Razor Components to accept constant strings #35465
    enhancement, area-blazor, area-razor.compiler, Backlog
  • Kestrel dev certificate woes #26536
    bug, area-commandlinetools, affected-few, severity-minor, Next sprint planning
  • Fix minimal APIs behavior with duplicate endpoint and route names #35436
    bug, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • ASP.NET Core and SPAs in .NET 6 #27887
    area-mvc, feature-spa, User Story, Priority:1, Bottom Up Work, 6.0.0
  • Enqueue_DisposedPreventsRestart is flaky #35228
    test-failure, area-razor.tooling, razor.tooling-fundamentals, Razor.Tooling

PullRequests

Created

  • Added support for type based parameter binding (#35496) #35535
  • Merge internal commits for 2.1.30 #35534
  • [release/6.0] Throw when unsupported HTTPS options are set for HTTP/3 #35533
    area-runtime
  • Throw when unsupported HTTPS options are set for HTTP/3 #35532
    area-runtime, HTTP3
  • RC1 Port: Add FailureReasons (#35425) #35529
    area-security, ask-mode
  • Set EndpointName and DisplayName given method name in endpoints (#35439) #35527
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Treat parameters in oblivious nullability context as optional #35526
    ask-mode, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Binding support for 'bool' values with InputRadioGroup and InputSelect #35523
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #35522
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore dotnet/runtime #35513
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Reliability improvement for input date E2E tests #35505
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc1
  • Release object URL after image for resize has loaded #35499
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-rc1] HTTP/3: Response drain timeout #35492
    area-runtime, ask-mode, 6.0-rc1
  • Skip consistently failing `Components.E2ETests.ServerTransportsTest`s #35484
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0-rc1] HTTP/3: Use new QuicStream.ReadsCompleted property in transport #35483
    area-runtime, ask-mode
  • HTTP/3: Use new QuicStream.ReadsCompleted property in transport #35482
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Added support for type based parameter binding #35496
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore #35519

    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 7.0-preview1

    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Add an analyzer that complains when using using model binding attributes with a minimal action delegate (#35359) #35480
    Servicing-approved, 6.0-rc1

    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #35510

  • [release/6.0-rc1] E2E test fixes #35460
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, tell-mode, 6.0-rc1
  • Binding support for 'bool' values with InputRadioGroup and InputSelect #35318
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore #35479
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35474
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1
  • Set EndpointName and DisplayName given method name in endpoints #35439
    Servicing-approved, ask-mode, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • HTTP/3: Add tests for issue and unskip fixed tests #35442
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Add an analyzer that complains when using using model binding attributes with a minimal action delegate #35359
    7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Improve Minimal APIs support for request media types #35082 #35230
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/3.1] Expose all references when not restoring #33197
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.17
  • [release/6.0-rc1] HTTP/3: Fix incorrectly pooling aborted streams #35441
    area-runtime, ask-mode, 6.0-rc1
  • Identity UI Bootstrap 5.1 tweaks #35467
    area-identity
  • Reset HttpRequestPipeReader error state if reused #35432
    area-runtime
  • Update middleware that assumes UseRouting is called after them, for minimal hosting #35426
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
